title: Bachelorette fans insist Jamie Doran's behaviour is 'creepy'
text:
She was enjoying some one-on-one time with the show's charismatic intruder.

But all that changed when Jamie Doran crashed Angie Kent's intimate moment with Ryan Anderson on Thursday night's episode of The Bachelorette.

And now viewers have flocked to Twitter to criticise Jamie's decision to boldly interrupt their conversation, with some claiming his behaviour is 'creepy' and 'uncomfortable'.

'You're making everyone uncomfortable!' Fans have labelled Jamie Doran (pictured) 'creepy' after he insisted on joining Angie Kent and Ryan Anderson's intimate one-on-one time on The Bachelorette

'Can someone give Jamie several chill pills,' one person wrote.

'Jamie is acting so creepy,' one person insisted. 'Did your mum never teach you two's company, three's a crowd,' another wrote.

'I've dated five stage clingers like Jamie as well. Haha. They're the ones that keep messaging years after the fact,' one person added.

'Jamie is acting so creepy!' Viewers flocked to Twitter to criticise Jamie's decision to interrupt Angie's one-on-one time with Ryan

'Oh Jamie, no. Just no. No. No. No. Not cool. You're making everyone uncomfortable. Just calm down and breathe. Maybe take a Valium or something. Eeek!' one said.

Another wrote: 'When a woman says the word "creepy" within 30 seconds of you arriving, that's when you should jump into lava.'

Meanwhile, Jamie interrupted Angie and Ryan's one-on-one time to explain that he didn't spend time with her Gogglebox co-star Yvie Jones on Thursday.

Excuse me! On Thursday, Jamie interrupted Angie and Ryan's conversation to explain that he didn't spend any time with her Gogglebox co-star Yvie Jones

Surprised: A stunned Angie (pictured) immediately told Jamie that 'it sounds a bit creepy'

'Guys, this is going to sound like a bit of a curveball. I actually want to sit in with both of you,' he told the pair.

'I just want to kind of explore, like, some things about Yvie [Angie's best friend],' he added.

He continued: 'She is your soulmate. For me, I know what she thinks of you and what you think of her and it was really important for me to touch base with her.'

A stunned Angie immediately told Jamie that 'it sounds a bit creepy' before Ryan made it clear that he needed the one-on-one time.
description: She was enjoying some one-on-one time with the show's charismatic intruder.
authors: Mary Mrad For Daily Mail Australia
